com.xtructure.xevolution.genetics
Interface GeneticsFactory<D>

Type Parameters:
D - type of data used in Genomes
All Superinterfaces:
EvolutionObject
All Known Subinterfaces:
ARTGeneticsFactory<D>, NEATGeneticsFactory<D>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractARTGeneticsFactory, AbstractGeneticsFactory, AbstractNEATGeneticsFactory, ArithmeticGeneticsFactory, ArithmeticGeneticsFactory, ARTGeneticsFactoryImpl, GeneticsFactoryImpl, NEATGeneticsFactoryImpl
public interface GeneticsFactory<D>
extends EvolutionObject

The GeneticsFactory interface describes methods for creating and copying Genomes, their payload data, and Populations. Populations are created with a number of new Genomes specified by EvolutionFieldMap.populationSize().

Author:
Luis Guimbarda

Method Summary
